reviews.review_msg: Easy course with a great prof, why not??

Sandie is a real gem of all the courses present there. She is a pretty kind-hearted and generous soul ie. looks and takes care of her students pretty well. In general, FNST201 is more of a writing course and a very easy course too. Sandie makes it very easy for her students to get an A or A+. If you follow the guidelines given by her. DO YOUR BEST
she is my favorite professor. she is caring, helpful professor among all other. i love this course and her as well. she has made the 200 level course easy and interesting to study.
She is the kindest prof ever, Please be nice to her. IF you have any problems just let her know about it she will help you. Very encouraging.

She is just amazing. Always ready to talk to you and discuss your papers. If you need some more time for your assignment(s) just talk to her, and she will let you submit later. She is clear with her expectations, so you can easily get an A or even A+ if you follow the instructions.

I took her class at FIC. She helped me so much to do well in this course. I got 100% almost in all assignments. Just listen carefully to what she needs from you and follow the instructions, and you'll get 100%. Her lectures kind of useless, but you still have to attend because participation and attendance worth 20%. Good luck!
